content: Once you reach the Temple Entrance Shrine, you'll finally be able to start exploring the Temple of Yellow Flowers, which is still a fairly spread out complex tucked into pathways further up the mountain.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Temple_of_Yellow_Flowers_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Temple of Yellow Flowers Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Temple Entrance'.
The content is as follows:
Once you reach the Temple Entrance Shrine, you'll finally be able to start exploring the Temple of Yellow Flowers, which is still a fairly spread out complex tucked into pathways further up the mountain.
